title: Settings
pref_description: Set your default crew and depot. These values will be used as default filters in the route planner.
business_language_hint: Language used for emails and external communication with customers.
email_confirmation_hint: Sent immediately after scheduling an appointment.
email_third_hint: This template is prepared for another scenario.
email_edited_at: Manually edited on {{date}}. Changing company language won't affect this template.
email_using_default: Using default template based on company language.

break_description: Configure whether a lunch break should be automatically inserted into newly created routes.
break_auto_insert: Automatically insert break into new routes
break_time_hint: Break will be placed between {{from}} and {{to}}.
break_km_hint: Break will be placed after driving {{min}} to {{max}} km from start.
break_driving_rule: Insert 45-minute break after maximum 4.5 hours of cumulative driving

worker_description:
Workers have access to customers, calendar, planner and other pages.
They cannot change settings or manage the admin panel.
worker_empty: You don't have any workers yet.
worker_empty_hint: Workers can log in with their account and work with the system.
worker_error_password: Password must be at least 8 characters
worker_confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete worker "{{name}}"?
role_empty: You don't have any custom roles yet.
role_empty_hint: Create roles for your workers and assign them permissions to control their access to different parts of the system.
role_confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete role "{{name}}"? This action is irreversible.
import_customers_desc: Imports customers from CSV. Automatically triggers address geocoding.
import_devices_desc: Imports devices from CSV. Requires existing customers (linked via Company ID/email/phone).
import_revisions_desc: Imports revisions from CSV. Requires existing devices (linked via serial number).
import_comm_desc: Imports communication history (calls, emails, notes) from CSV.
import_zip_desc: Import multiple files at once from a single ZIP archive. Automatically recognizes file types and imports them in the correct order.
import_order_hint: Import in the listed order (1-5). Each import requires data from previous steps.
dt_description: Manage device types and their custom fields. Each type has a default revision duration and interval.
dt_error_key_conflict: A device type with this name already exists

delete_all_desc: Permanently and irreversibly delete your account and all associated data. Even Ariadline support cannot recover data removed this way. If you want to continue using the service, you will need to register again.
delete_dialog_warning: This operation will PERMANENTLY AND IRREVERSIBLY delete:
